name: Chungo Kong 2
description:
Chungo Kong is back! His defeat was but a mere ruse! Your challenge from the big C is not done until you scale his building and destroy him, once and for all. Traps and obstacles are lined up in all corners, so watch out!

This groundbreaking sequel features a whole 2 levels, plus a boss fight! 

This game was made as a self imposed challenge in 4 days.
